title: nIlAmbari jagadIshvari
sahitya:
nIlAmbari jagadIshvari amba nI irangA viDil vEru gati Edu


anupallavi

  bAlAmbikE un karuNaith-tuLiyaladu bhava bhayam tIrkka marunduNDO shrI


caraNam    kailAspati kapAli manOhari mayilApuri vaLar paradEvatE
kayal pOl vizhiyAl kannal nErmozhiyAi kalpakAmbA rAmadAsan paNiyum
